summary: Phase 2 kickoff for mobile app storage and OAuth readiness
changes: Activated OAuth/API dependencies: googleapis, google_sign_in, msal_flutter, http
Added AppPaths helper to anchor rules and safe senders in application support directory
Added LocalRuleStore for YAML persistence with default file scaffolding
Added SecureCredentialsStore for encrypted credential handling
Fixed YAML export quoting to preserve apostrophes during round-trip

Connect Gmail/Outlook adapters to secure credential storage
Add tests for storage read/write and credential flows
Prioritize provider rollout order: AOL → Gmail → Outlook
